FuncDef: This command enables the use of vxlan in the VPLS service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the vxlan network identifier (VNI) configured in the VPLS service. All EVPN advertisements (mac routes and inclusive multicast routes) for this services will encode the configured VNI in the Ethernet Tag field of the NLRI. Values-1 to 16777215.
This keyword is mandatory when creating a vxlan instance.
